name: Litany of Order
text: By shouting a forceful litany of strictures, you make a chaotic creature more susceptible to the attacks of lawful creatures. If the target is chaotic, it takes double the normal damage from attacks made by creatures that have a lawful aura from a class feature or by creatures that have the lawful subtype. If the target also has the chaotic subtype, when it is hit with attacks made by creatures with a lawful aura, it is also sickened for 1 round. If this spell targets a nonchaotic creature (or one that lacks the chaotic subtype), it has no effect and the spell is wasted. While subject to this spell, the target cannot be the target of another spell that has the word “litany” in the title.
text_zh: 通过喊出一串强有力的指责，你使一个混乱的生物更容易受到秩序生物的攻击。如果目标是混乱的，那么它在面对来自具有秩序灵光的职业或拥有秩序亚种的生物的攻击时，会受到双倍的普通伤害。如果目标还有混乱亚种，当它被具有秩序灵光的生物攻击时，目标还会恶心1轮。如果此法术以非混乱生物（或缺乏混乱亚种的生物）为目标，则该法术没有效果，且该法术被浪费。当受此法术影响时，目标不能成为名称中带有“祷言”字样的其他法术的目标。
